snippet.title: Takoyaki Surprise - Now In Active Development
snippet.description:
The Octopus Princess has been kidnapped by the evil celebrity chef, Shefu and plans to cook her on live TV for the entire world to see! As loyal samurai from her kingdom, embark on a perilous quest to Restaurant Island as Tako and Sakana to try and save her from this culinary calamity! The Island itself is full of dangerous food themed dungeons each guarded by Shefu's evil and corrupted cooking. It will take everything Tako and Sakana have in them to brave through the eight levels to save their princess.

Takoyaki Surprise is a point and click action game scheduled to be released February 2024 with an original soundtrack by Merdosia.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2475510/Takoyaki_Surprise/
http://redtrianglegames.com/
